divs: Sighting Detailsmy car broke down on hwy 5 i was with my ex husband and my daughter,the battery went dead on the car..as we waited for a tow truck,i saw a huge light coming over a hill i expected to see a tracktor or something similair but to my disbelief all of a sudden instead of a tractor there was a bright like the size of a comet a very big comet, it was bright yellow it just looked like a ball of light,it was so briight it was almost blinding as we watched it, it continued to rise up and changed to blue, then green then dark red and shot so fast to the heavens. we watched it until it was just a dot even with the stars...i dont know if this is some kinda goverment secret but it was absolutley amazing.....for all these years my family and i have keep this our lil secret but it seems the world is a lil more receptable to this now so i just had to let others no we are not alone.
